TopicTitle: i'm on duna... now how do i get back?

Articles.Content:
i landed on duna and i have 4 tanks of fuel and a nuclear engine how do i get back can someone please help bill is stranded for now

Edited October 9, 2012 by sleedog1

Hiya sleedog1, welcome to the community

Well you'll want to get back into orbit, then it's much like how you got to Duna in the first place, I'm no good with angles though so I suggest you quicksave and have a few attempts.

If you copy your quicksave you'll be able to make more and not lose your position on Duna.

Welcome to the forums sleedog1.

Listen to sal_vagar's advice as I haven't attempted inter-planetary stuff yet, but it seems easy enough.

Good Luck rescuing Bill Kerman and he will return as a hero.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!

Try to get into orbit around Duna, and send another ship from Kerbin to Duna to meet Bill in orbit around Duna. Transfer Bill from your orbiting lander to your "return ship" which should have enough fuel to go back to Kerbin
thanks! it really helped i'm in the de orbit process at kerbin. thanks
